data.prayer: Jesus, defend your people in the county of Puducherry against the difficulty of these last days.
data.verse: But mark this: There will be terrible times in the last days. 2 People will be lovers of themselves, lovers of money, boastful, proud, abusive, disobedient to their parents, ungrateful, unholy, 3 without love, unforgiving, slanderous, without self-control, brutal, not lovers of the good, 4 treacherous, rash, conceited, lovers of pleasure rather than lovers of God— 5 having a form of godliness but denying its power.

data.location_label: Photo from the county of Puducherry, Puducherry, India
data.section_summary: What conditions of religion or environment could you pray for here?

data.prayer: Spirit, teach the 10,453 believers in the county of Puducherry the wisdom of how to form simple, reproducible churches of 12-30 in every neighborhood.

data.label_1: One disciple of Jesus for every 90 lost neighbors

data.prayer: Lord, like in the church of Antioch, where you gathered many prophets and teachers, please gather many prophets and teachers in the county of Puducherry, Puducherry, India.
data.verse: Now in the church at Antioch there were prophets and teachers: Barnabas, Simeon called Niger, Lucius of Cyrene, Manaen (who had been brought up with Herod the tetrarch), and Saul.

data.prayer: Father, please help good, online teachers get the gospel on YouTube and into the the county of Puducherry.
data.verse: And this gospel of the kingdom will be preached in the whole world as a testimony to all nations, and then the end will come.

data.prayer: Lord, Let your Kingdom come among the Ambalavasi people. Let your will be done, as in heaven, so on earth.
Lord, make the 10,453 believers in Puducherry to be brave and clear with the gospel to their 939,846 neighbors.
data.verse: So Paul and Barnabas spent considerable time there, speaking boldly for the Lord, who confirmed the message of his grace by enabling them to perform signs and wonders.

data.prayer: Father, please send new apostles into the harvest, who can open up new communities for the gospel in the county of Puducherry, Puducherry, India.
data.verse: Ask the Lord of the harvest, therefore, to send out workers into his harvest field.

data.section_summary:
the county of Puducherry, Puducherry, India has a population of 950,300.

We estimate Puducherry has 10,453 people who might know Jesus, 11,530 people who might know about Jesus culturally, and 928,316 people who do not know Jesus.

This is 1 believer for every 90 neighbors who need Jesus.

data.prayer: Father, remind your church in Puducherry that they can know and depend on the love you have for them.
data.verse: We know and have believed the love which God has for us. God is love, and he who remains in love remains in God, and God remains in him.
